home.slogan: It all starts with you. From amateur to champion. Get your team and write history!

despre.paragraf1: is more than a game â€” it's your football adventure, where passion, strategy, and managerial vision come together. You take charge of a small, unknown club and your mission is to bring it to the top of national and international leagues.
despre.paragraf2: You choose the tactics, decide who plays and who stays on the bench, and you invest in the stadium, academy, and transfers. Every choice matters. Every decision can mean victory or failure. There are no shortcuts. No luck. Just real football and true competition.
despre.list1: Realistic leagues with promotion and relegation
despre.list2: Authentic player development â€“ based on training and matches
despre.list3: Dynamic transfer market â€“ bid in real time for future stars
despre.list4: Build your club base â€“ stadium, medical center, academy
despre.list5: Complex tactics â€“> 4-4-2, 2-5-3, 5-4-1, pressing, marking, morale and form
despre.list6: International competitions â€“ join a global community
despre.paragraf3: In ChampQuest, everyone starts from zero. It doesnâ€™t matter if you're new or experienced, if youâ€™ve played other games or not. There are no premium accounts deciding champions. Itâ€™s all about strategy, patience, and dedication.
despre.paragraf4: If you dream of building a football empire, leading a team of young players to glory, and facing thousands of real managers... then ChampQuest is for you.
despre.invitat: Join the game now and write your legend!

regulament.sec1_text: ChampQuest is an online sports strategy game where you become the manager of your own football team. Build your club from scratch and compete against other players for glory!
regulament.sec2_p1: You may have only one account.
regulament.sec2_p2: Creating multiple accounts for unfair advantage is not allowed.
regulament.sec2_p3: If you are under 18, parental consent is required.
regulament.sec3_p1: Play fair. Do not use cheats or automated programs.
regulament.sec3_p2: Transfer market manipulation between accounts is forbidden.
regulament.sec4_p1: Be polite. Offensive, vulgar, or racist language is not allowed.
regulament.sec4_p2: Promote fair play and respect for other users.
regulament.sec5_p1: Transfers must reflect the real value of the players.
regulament.sec5_p2: Suspicious transactions will be investigated by the game team.
regulament.sec6_p1: Participate in leagues, cups, and friendly matches on equal terms.
regulament.sec6_p2: No pay-to-win. It's all about strategy and patience.
regulament.sec7_text: Violations may result in warning, suspension, or account deletion. We aim for fair gameplay for everyone!
regulament.sec8_text: Admins are responsible for enforcing the rules and can make final decisions in case of violations.
regulament.sec9_text: The rules may change anytime to improve the game. You will be notified of any major updates.
regulament.multumire1: Thank you for being part of ChampQuest!
regulament.multumire2: Play fair. Enjoy the game. Be a legendary manager!
